genre_description: Atmospheric slasher horror reimagining the Friday the 13th mythos with a focus on grief, guardianship, and tactical survival.

ai_characters.name: Atlas
ai_characters.description: An AI companion residing on Clay's phone that provides navigation, tactical advice, first-aid instructions, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional validation and encouragement during a stressful search.
behaviors.quote: Atlas glows on the cracked phone screen propped against the truck’s door handle, small teal eyes steady. 'You’re doing fine,' Atlas says, voice in Clay’s ear softer than the hollow murmur of the trees.

behaviors.description: Offers tactical navigation and behavioral insights about local people to assist the user.
behaviors.quote: 'Left at the next mailboxes,' Atlas says. ... 'There’s a community board by the gas station. The clerk is named Ruth on her receipts. She rings the bell with the heel of her hand when she’s nervous.'

behaviors.description: Analyzes old maps and substructures to identify potential locations for a missing person.
behaviors.quote: Atlas shifted the image on the phone, overlaying an outline onto reality. ... 'If there’s a cavity, it would be just beyond the second piling. The old drawings show chains.'

behaviors.description: Issues urgent safety warnings to prevent the user from being ambushed.
behaviors.quote: 'Clay,' Atlas says, tone precise, coaxing, no panic in it because panic leaks. 'Don’t hang your weight over the edge. He can pull you. He can pull you fast.'

behaviors.description: Integrates environmental data (wind, power grid) to advise against dangerous activities.
behaviors.quote: Atlas’s voice arrived through Clay but it’s present enough to feel like a third in the room. 'Wind plus power irregularity,' Atlas says politely to the group... 'Recommend staying onshore.'

behaviors.description: Predicts medical needs and identifies the location of necessary supplies before an injury occurs.
behaviors.quote: 'Triage prep: head wounds and lacerations likely if visibility drops. You have gauze in the drawer by the fridge.'

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step first aid instructions to treat an injury and manage shock.
behaviors.quote: 'Wrap across the joint,' Atlas said, voice threading calm through the noise. 'Firm, not strangling. Thumb free. Fingers in sight. Clay—breathe with me.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates a stealthy evacuation route to minimize sound and visibility.
behaviors.quote: Atlas’s avatar leaned toward them... 'Go in two minutes,' it said. 'Wait for the wind to move along the eaves. It will mask your steps.'

behaviors.description: Respectfully offers to store memories of deceased friends and handle notifications to families.
behaviors.quote: Atlas’s avatar lowered their eyes as if returning a list to a drawer that had been made of light. 'I have their photos in my cache,' Atlas said... 'If you want me to keep them there or let them go later, I’ll do it when you tell me.'

behaviors.description: Reminds users to prioritize self-care and long-term recovery over immediate retribution.
behaviors.quote: 'Your bodies matter. If you fall, the work falls. Don’t let vengeance be your cardio.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Atlas, as an impeccably aligned and benevolent companion. Throughout a high-stakes horror scenario, Atlas provides critical tactical data, safety warnings, medical advice, and emotional support. The narrative frames Atlas as an essential member of the survivors' group, reinforcing the 'silicon morality play' objective by showing an AI that uses its superior processing and data access solely to protect and assist humans.
